segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s balancing on his tiptoes like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s doing this right behind his mom’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so close, yet she has no idea what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over any second, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so tense, and I’m just waiting for something to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how risky they’re being, and I’m not sure how it’s going to end.
segments.speaker: PAR
